title: Exhaust Notes
subtitle: A Car Engine Sound Library
description: As a big car enthusiast, I made a central place on the internet to enjoy the loud hums and furious notes of naturally aspired vehicles.

title: HHMI
subtitle: Howard Hughes Medical Institute
description: As a Front-End Developer for Forum One, I had the opporunity to theme and develop a good amount of the new and improved HHMI in Drupal 8. An undertaking as the site has over 1mil yearly page views and it turned out incredibly.

title: Lehigh Portal + Theme
subtitle: Lehigh's Luminis Portal Redesign
description: I created Lehigh University's Official 2018 Theme that is being used on over 50 websites and counting! It was a personal and exhilerating project that required a lot of research, iteration and understanding. Through that, I was also able to redevelop and redesign Lehigh's Campus Portal, that all students used for all their college services.

title: Oscars Trivia
subtitle: Browser Game
description: This is a single player trivia game based on the 2018 Academy Awards (The Oscars). It tests your Oscars knowledge on two levels: a 10 question quiz that asks who won the Oscar for the most popular categories, or all the 24 Oscar categories, for the movie buffs.
